name: ObiTom's Nano Calculato
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Notum Amplification Coil drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Notum Amplification Coil" "257963" #L "Aquarius's Multitask Calculator" "244376" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Notum Amplification Coil + Aquarius's Multitask Calculator = #L "ObiTom's Nano Calculator" "257118" Skills: | 1250 CL |
